cab.content: LL Qh^ffiom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, -- -........1st September 1919.(Repeated to Constantinople)(Received 2nd September.)11909. 1st September. General Malleson wires 31st August: " Russians who reached here yesterday via Kaahka from Trans-Caspia says German (corrupt group) are undoubtedly organising whole Asiatic campaign of Bolsheviks."I have had similar rumour before from other sources.
